Message:
I’ve been hearing more
of those rumors throughout
town recently.

But cursed creatures, thought
to be the spawn of witches,

Then, people began
to whisper as if releasing
the frustrations caused
by their fears and anxieties.
If only that witch wasn’t here...

so it was only a matter
of time before rumors
became “truths.”

Then, girls who were
targeted by these rumors
would eventually be
taken away by knights,

All while not even knowing
who gave them away,
or why...
